attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Explain why no MP whistle blew to the public and the involvement of House Fees Office and other offices of the House.
Will he explain what he is going to do to ensure that his employers (the public) are informed of any misuse of its funds or the powers that it vests in both houses and that appropriate sanctions are available to both houses?
We do not consider a slap on the wrist and suspension from a cosy club to be appropriate punishment for attempting to unethically benefit from the position of trust that members of both houses are given.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
